name: Sewer Scoundrels
description:
Final Project for my Intro to Game Design & Development course.

An adventure game largely (if not entirely) inspired by the Mystery Dungeon series of games, you are a rat in the sewers and that's not good at all. You gotta escape, but the other inhabitants will not be cooperative.

Credits:

  • Character behavior, combat system: ChipChip (me!)
  • Level generation, UI design: LightBoat (https://lightboat.itch.io/)
  • Shader implementation, cutscenes: Jahdiel-C (https://github.com/Jahdiel-C)
  • Art assets: OlivF (https://github.com/unccOlivi)

Made in GameMaker Studio
